example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2SnapshotAttribute -SnapshotId snap-12345678 -Attribute ProductCodes
CreateVolumePermissions ProductCodes SnapshotId ----------------------- ------------ ---------- {} {} snap-12345678
example.description: This example describes the specified attribute of the specified snapshot.

example.code:
PS C:\> (Get-EC2SnapshotAttribute -SnapshotId snap-12345678 -Attribute CreateVolumePermission).CreateVolumePermissions
Group UserId ----- ------ all
example.description: This example describes the specified attribute of the specified snapshot.
